headline: Mettler-Toledo International (MTD) Surged Due to Increased Optimism in Life Sciences Tools Companies
summary: Baron Fund, an investment management company, released its Q4 2025 letter for “Baron Asset Fund”. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. Equities experienced a strong fourth quarter, capping off a volatile year. However, the Russell Midcap Growth Index (the Index) ended the quarter down 3.70%. In this environment, the Baron Asset Fund […]
